wikipedia_page.main:
Jake Offiler is a London born rower who, as part of the United Kingdom team, won silver in the 2018 World Rowing Junior Championships. He is also a member of Globe RC.
Earlier in the 2017-18 season he was also part of the Great Britain team that attended the 2018 European Rowing Junior Championships in Gravelines, France. There he won a gold medal in the double sculls, making him junior European champion.
